name: Vegan Broccoli Rice Casserole
description: This vegan broccoli rice casserole makes such a great side dish! You won't believe how cheesy and creamy it is completely without dairy products. And it's so easy to make!
recipeIngredient: 4 cups cooked brown rice ((equals 2 cups uncooked))
1 1/2 cups unsweetened almond or soy milk
1 teaspoon white or yellow miso paste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 350 °F. Wash the broccoli and cut it into florets. Cook the broccoli either on the stovetop or in an Instant Pot (choose "0 minutes" on manual).
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat your oven to 350 °F. Wash the broccoli and cut it into florets. Cook the broccoli either on the stovetop or in an Instant Pot (choose "0 minutes" on manual).

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a large baking dish with vegan margarine.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a large baking dish with vegan margarine.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion until it's translucent. This should take about 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion until it's translucent. This should take about 3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients for the sauce into a high speed blender and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all of the ingredients for the sauce into a high speed blender and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the cooked rice, the cooked broccoli, the sautéed onion, and the sauce. Stir carefully.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to the prepared baking dish, add the shredded vegan cheese and bake for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with freshly chopped parsley and serve immediately. Enjoy!
